text:
@realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX TRUMP: Maybe people can treat COVID-19 by ingesting disinfectant
D: That’s appalling
R: He never said that
D: Here’s the tape
R: It was sarcasm
D: People might try it
R: TDS
D: They’re ending up in the hospital
R: False flags
D: Vote Trump out
U: But Biden hasn’t earned my vote
